fullText:
I asked my wife how often she uses an LLM.

She didnâ€™t know what that meant.

So I asked her if she uses ChatGPT, expecting to hear her say a couple times/week.

Nope, 5-6 times/day.

â€œWhat model do you use?â€

No idea what that means. 

But it works well enough.
